components.description: A person shown in water with a ball, playing the sport of water polo.
components.title: Water Polo

components.description:
Zero Width Joiner (ZWJ) is a Unicode character that joins two or more other characters together in sequence to create a new emoji.

Zero Width Joiner, pronounced "zwidge", is not an emoji and has no appearance by itself. This is an invisible character when used alone.

View Emoji ZWJ Sequences that use this character.
components.title: Zero Width Joiner

components.description: A circle shown with a crossed vertical line beneath it, used as a representation for women. Often used on International Women's Day.
components.title: Female Sign

description: A woman shown in water with a ball, playing the sport of water polo.
title: Woman Playing Water Polo

emoji_net_data.definition: The Woman Playing Water Polo emoji is a sequence of the ?? Water Polo, ? Female Sign and ? Variation Selector-16 emojis. These are combined  http://emojipedia.org/woman-playing-water-polo/
emoji_net_data.name: woman playing water polo

bn:00001530n: A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)

bn:00080622n: A water sport consisting of two teams of swimmers who have to throw the ball into the opponents goal.
Sport played in water by teams competing to put the ball into the opponent's goal
A game played in a swimming pool by two teams of swimmers who try to throw an inflated ball into the opponents' goal
Water polo is a team water sport.
A team water sport, which can be best described as a combination of swimming, handball and wrestling.

apple_vendor_description: This dynamic emoji on Apple devices features a woman actively engaged in playing water polo, captured mid-action with a sense of energetic movement. Apple‚Äôs design language imbues the figure with realistic lighting and smooth, fluid lines, emphasizing the athleticism and the splash of water around her. The determined expression and athletic posture, rendered with Apple's signature clarity, convey a spirit of sport, competition, and robust physical activity.
